thread.title: NOPD: 2 people caught on camera trying to steal truck in Lakevie
thread.title_full: NOPD: 2 people caught on camera trying to steal truck in Lakevie - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: Kristen Soroe
title: NOPD: 2 people caught on camera trying to steal truck in Lakevie
text:
NEW ORLEANS (WVUE) - New Orleans Police release surveillance video of two people they say attempted to steal a truck in front of a Lakeview residence.
Officers say the attempted theft happened around 1:45 a.m. Tuesday in the 6600 block of General Diaz Street.
Police say video surveillance caught the pair trying to break into a Chevy Silverado.
Moments later, officers say the owner of the Silverado walked outside and startled the two. They took off.
If you have any information on this attempted truck theft, you're urged to call Crimestoppers at (504) 822-1111.
Copyright 2015 WVUE.
